btrplace.solver.choco.transition

Interface Transition

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KeepRunningVM, NodeTransition, VMTransition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BootableNode, BootVM, ForgeVM, KillVM, RelocatableVM, ResumeVM, ShutdownableNode, ShutdownVM, StayAwayVM, SuspendVM

    public interface Transition
    A model skeleton for a transition. See TransitionUtils to extract components of Transitions.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier
    See Also:
    TransitionUtils

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      solver.variables.IntVar getDuration()
      Get the action duration.
      solver.variables.IntVar getEnd()
      Get the moment the action ends.
      solver.variables.IntVar getStart()
      Get the moment the action starts.
      solver.variables.BoolVar getState()
      Get the next state of the subject manipulated by the action.
      boolean insertActions(ReconfigurationPlan plan)
      Insert into a plan the actions resulting from the model.

    • Method Detail

      • getStart

        solver.variables.IntVar getStart()
        Get the moment the action starts.
        Returns:
        a variable that must be positive

      • getEnd

        solver.variables.IntVar getEnd()
        Get the moment the action ends.
        Returns:
        a variable that must be greater than getStart()

      • getDuration

        solver.variables.IntVar getDuration()
        Get the action duration.
        Returns:
        a duration equals to getEnd() - getStart()

      • insertActions

        boolean insertActions(ReconfigurationPlan plan)
        Insert into a plan the actions resulting from the model.
        Parameters:
        plan - the plan to modify
        Returns:
        true iff success

      • getState

        solver.variables.BoolVar getState()
        Get the next state of the subject manipulated by the action.
        Returns:
        0 for offline, 1 for online.
